name: ETL Converter
short_description: ETL Converter is a migration tool that builds open source ETL projects from existing projects made with proprietary software. The first version converts DataStage projects into Talend Open Studio projects. Other sources/targets will be available later.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: Advanced End Users

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: OS Portable (Source code to work with many OS platforms)
os.fullname: OS Portable (Source code to work with many OS platforms)

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: OS Independent (Written in an interpreted language)
os.fullname: OS Independent (Written in an interpreted language)
